distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for fetchmail fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-39272: Fix failure to enforce STARTTLS session encryption in some circumstances, such as a certain situation with IMAP and PREAUTH. (bsc#1190069)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Fetchmail before 6.4.22 fails to enforce STARTTLS session encryption in some circumstances, such as a certain situation with IMAP and PREAUTH.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
